Posts.Content: hi, i find i dont belong any more i had recon in september went ack january must of been to early for me as wham bam very emional no one tells you about that every one looks at you they think shes looks ok she can do her work as before even though the doctors note says otherwise, take time of again if you can and try for counselling even though it takes forever to come through good luck take care
